column4: I'm trying to write an image file to a cd, how am I supposed to mount the cd though?
a cd image file .iso
you can't mount the blank CD you're burning to
what am I supposed to do?
Gnome should have asked you if you wanted to burn a CD when you inserted the empty disc
if it didn't, right-click on the .iso and select burn
if you are comfortable with the command line, wodim also burns CD images
run "apt-cache show gnomebaker" and it will list a path on Ubuntu's archive servers
it did not show couldnt' find any servers for it
archive.ubuntu.org/ubuntu
oh wait, I might have misinterpreted you
do you have universe repositories?
I'm trying to download it from on to my computer with windows, then transfer it to my ubuntu comp
you should fix that :)
but in this case, it's a little easier
just go to packages.ubuntu.com, search for gnomebaker, and download the correct dist.
how do I know which dist I have?
you don't know if you're on Dapper or Edgy or Feisty or Gusty?
I got my live cd from here http://www.ubuntu.com/getubuntu/download
when?
Gusty was released last month
probably Feisty, then
unless you went for LTS and got Dapper... :-/
